pkgmetadata.longdescription: Using the Docker Container to Create R Workers on Local or Cloud Platform // This is the core package that provides both the user API and developer API to deploy the parallel cluster on the cloud using the container service. The user can call clusterPreset() to define the cloud service provider and container and makeDockerCluster() to create the cluster. The developer should see "developer's cookbook" on how to define the cloud provider and container.
